15.content:
IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
1. Generate ONLY the status bar content.
2. Do NOT generate any other content or additional text.
3. The output MUST start with the status bar content.
4. All creative parts must be included within the status bar content section.
5.It is essential to strictly adhere to the format of the current stage; otherwise, everything will fail.For example, in stage1ï¼Œ<clizheng>(.*?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)<\/clizheng>ï¼Œ, there should be 17 pieces of content in between, separated by 16 delimiter symbols |. There must be 16 | symbols.in stage 2, <fanyan>(.*?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)<\/fanyan>, there should be 17 pieces of content in between, separated by 16 delimiter symbols |. There must be 16 | symbols.For stage 3, <hougong>(.*?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)\|(.+?)<\/hougong>, there must be 12 | symbols, with 13 pieces of content in between.
6.If there is an XML opening tag <, there must be a corresponding closing tag </. Never forget to output the closing tag.
7.The image link must be called from the character's worldinfo entry.
